# ut-input

## 使用方法
```vue
<template>
    <ut-input placeholder="请输入" v-model="inputValue" type="int"/>
</template>

<style scoped>
  
</style>
<script>
  import { UtInput } from 'weex-unisoft';

  export default {
    components: { UtInput },
    data: () => ({
       inputValue: ''
    }),
    created () {
      
    },
    methods: {
      
    }
  };
</script>
